title: That Council approve the recommendations outlined in Report CLSFS23-025, dated April 3, 2023 of the Commissioner of Corporate and Legislative Services as follows: a) That the 2022 Audit Plan for the Corporation of the City of Peterborough, attached to Report CLSFS23-025 as Appendix A, be received; and b) That the Mayor and Chair of the Finance Committee be authorized to sign the Audit Planning Report, attached to Report CLSFS23-025 as Appendix B.
That this meeting adjourn at 5:56 p.m.
